metadata.title: CVE-2020-14148 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
The Server-Server protocol implementation in ngIRCd before 26~rc2 allows anout-of-bounds access, as demonstrated by the IRC_NJOIN() function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-14148` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ngircd - 26-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ngircd package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '26-2').
